components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: An industrial factory, with flue-gas stacks releasing exhaust into the air.
components.title: Factory

description: A woman working in a factory setting, depicted as wearing overalls and protective headgear while holding an active welding gun.
title: Woman Factory Worker

emoji_net_data.definition: The Woman Factory Worker emoji is a sequence of the ?? Woman and ?? Factory emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between eac http://emojipedia.org/female-factory-worker/
emoji_net_data.name: woman factory worker

bn:00104995a: Of or relating to or resulting from industry.
Of or relating to or resulting from industry
Of or relating to industry, notably manufacturing.

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00064681n: A member of the working class (not necessarily employed)

bn:00032675n: A plant consisting of one or more buildings with facilities for manufacturing
Single building or group of buildings and installations destined to industrial activities.

A factory or manufacturing plant is an industrial site, usually consisting of buildings and machinery, or more commonly a complex having several buildings, where workers manufacture goods or operate machines processing one product into another.
An establishment where products are manufactured using industrial methods.
Facility where goods are made, or processed
A building or other place where manufacturing takes place.
A manufacturing plant for paper, steel, textiles, etc.

apple_vendor_description: Apple‚Äôs woman factory worker emoji presents a determined figure, expertly rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting to convey a sense of industriousness and skill. She wears a practical uniform and a hard hat, both detailed with soft rounded edges and a subtle 3D sheen that emphasizes her role in production. This emoji, embodying hard work, dedication, and manufacturing prowess on Apple devices, is a powerful way to represent labor, industry, or the effort behind creating something.
